name: Akar Impex
overview:
Established in the year 1986, we, “Akar Impex Private Limited”, are an illustrious firm involved in manufacturing, supplying, Exporting Waste Water Treatment Systems. The product range offered by us includes Equipment For Wastewater Treatment Plants, Sewage Treatment Plants, Industrial Effluent Treatment Plants and many more to name in the catalog.

Certification & Membership: Certification Name: International Organization for Standardization Certification Type: ISO 9001:2000

Product Portfolio: We are an eminent firm that is manufacturing and supplying pristine range of Waste Water Treatment Systems. These treatment plants are manufactured by our experts, using supreme-grade material with contemporary technology. All our products are used for purification of water and make water portable for drinking and use in other industrial applications.

Our Team: Engineers & technicians Production managers Quality controllers R&D personnel Sales & marketing executives Administrative staff

Infrastructure: A modernized infrastructure facility is established by us to have systematic execution of all the trade activities. Sprawling over a vast area of land, this facility supports us in executing all the trade tasks in a well-coordinated way, under a single roof. Our manufacturing unit is installed with varied latest machines and tools that are essential for trouble-free running of production process.

Equipment For Water Treatment Plants: Backed by the profound experience of this domain, we are instrumental in offering quality range of Waste Water treatment Plants. All these treatment plants are manufactured in accordance with the norms and standards already laid by the industry.
